Detailed Description

The editor containing the GUI items to edit a vector-model.

void VectorEditor::setLeftMax ( int  max  ) 

Set the maximum left and right boundary for vector.

Because left bound can't be larger than right bound the both max values are set.

Parameters:
max The max value.

void VectorEditor::onToggled ( bool  enabled  )  [private, slot]

Enables/disables the vector boundary editors.

Parameters:
